title: "Timed out no response" When on hold.
content:
Hi, when ever I am on hold for exactly 15mins 32secs I get cut off and a message saying "Timed out no  response"...I have only had the phone for 2 weeks and this is the 1st time I have had to make a call like this, Ive had nrmal convos that last alot longer but it seems to be an inactivity problem. This is driving me carzy as I cannot find anyone who has this issue...Any help would be great thanks.
Jon
